name: AVAssetResourceLoaderDelegate
desc: Methods you can implement to handle resource-loading requests coming from a URL asset.

items.name: func resourceLoader(AVAssetResourceLoader, shouldWaitForLoadingOfRequestedResource: AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate if it wants to load the requested resource.

items.name: func resourceLoader(AVAssetResourceLoader, shouldWaitForRenewalOfRequestedResource: AVAssetResourceRenewalRequest) -> Bool
items.desc: Tells the delegate when assistance is required of the application to renew a resource.

items.name: func resourceLoader(AVAssetResourceLoader, didCancel: AVAssetResourceLoadingRequest)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that a prior loading request has been cancelled.

items.name: func resourceLoader(AVAssetResourceLoader, shouldWaitForResponseTo: URLAuthenticationChallenge) -> Bool
items.desc: Tells the delegate that assistance is required of the application to respond to an authentication challenge.

items.name: func resourceLoader(AVAssetResourceLoader, didCancel: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Informs the delegate that a prior authentication challenge has been cancelled.
